name: Noggle Statue - Malice
description: A small wobbly statue of Stalker's Acolyte, Malice.

languages.description: Ein kleine Wackelfigur vom Akolythen des Stalkers, Bosheit.
languages.name: Noggle-Statue: Bosheit

languages.description: Une petite statue à tête oscillante de Malice, un des disciples du Stalker.
languages.name: Statuette Noggle - Malice

languages.description: Una statuetta del discepolo dello Stalker, Malice, con la testa tremolante.
languages.name: Statuetta Noggle - Malice

languages.description: 스토커의 어콜라이트, 맬리스의 갸웃거리는 작은 인형입니다.
languages.name: 노글 스태츄 - 맬리스

languages.description: Una pequeña y tambaleante estatua de uno de los discípulos de Stalker, Malicia.
languages.name: Estatua Tambaleante - Malicia

languages.description: 一小座追猎者的追随者，怨恨摇头娃娃
languages.name: 怨恨摇头娃娃

languages.description: Stalkerの従者のボブルヘッド人形、Malice。
languages.name: Malice ボブルヘッド

languages.description: Mała chybotliwa figurka Akolity Stalkera: Zjadliwość.
languages.name: Figurka Noggle — Zjadliwość

languages.description: Uma estatueta articulada de um discípulo do Stalker, Malevolência.
languages.name: Estatueta: Malevolência

languages.description: 一小座 Stalker 的追隨者－怨恨的搖頭娃娃。
languages.name: 怨恨搖頭娃娃

languages.description: รูปปั้นตุ๊กตาหัวโยกขนาดเล็กของผู้ช่วยเหลือ Stalker - Malice
languages.name: รูปปั้น Noggle - Malice

languages.description: Stalker Acolyte, Malice küçük oynar figür.
languages.name: Noggle Heykeli - Malice

languages.description: Статуетка прибічника Сталкера на ім’я Злоба.
languages.name: Ноґл «Злоба»
